shortDescription: An issue was discovered in D-Link DIR-806 devices. There is a command injection in function hnap_main, which calls system() without checking the parameter that can be controlled by user, and finally allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary shell commands with a special HTTP header.
vulnerabilityName: D-Link dir-806_firmware Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
